createDefaultKnowledgeBase

KnowledgeBaseDescriptor createDefaultKnowledgeBase(String displayName)
Create a new default knowledge base with the specified parameters. Knowledge base description and type are being set to null.

Parameters:
displayName - display name of the knowledge base
Returns:
the descriptor of the new knowledge base

createDefaultKnowledgeBase

KnowledgeBaseDescriptor createDefaultKnowledgeBase(String displayName,
                                                   String description)
Create a new default knowledge base with the specified parameters. Knowledge base type is being set to null.

Parameters:
displayName - display name of the knowledge base
description - description of the knowledge base
Returns:

filterScopes

void filterScopes(Collection<Long> allowedScopes)
Filter out every topic names and relations those scope is not the specified scope list and mark them for removal.

Parameters:
allowedScopes - the collection of allowed scope id-s

cleanUp

void cleanUp()
Enforce integrity validation over the model and clean up every elements those fail to pass the validation (e.g. topics without topic names, topic names with disallowed scopes, relations with missing topic references etc.).
